text: Iyendiyeameneamakuyendetsanipamtundandiponso pa nyanja mpaka pamene inu muli m’ngalawa ndipo izo zimayendetsedwa ndi mphepo yabwino imene iwo amasangalala nayo. Koma mphepo ya mkuntho imawafikira ndipo mafunde amadza kwa iwo kuchokera ku mbali zonse ndipo iwo amaganiza kuti yawapeza ndipo amapemphera kwa Mulungu momuyeretsera chipembedzo chake. “Ngati mutipulumutse ku mavuto awa, ife tidzakhala othokoza.”
